basics.name: Julio Zeledón
basics.label: Full Stack Web Engineer (Frontend-focused)
basics.summary: Full Stack Web Engineer with 10+ years focused on React/Next.js and digital solution architecture. Specializes in UX, SEO-aware frontends, and scalable apps. Proven contributor and tech lead across cross‑functional teams, with experience integrating content platforms, ERPs, CI/CD, testing, and cloud-native tooling.

experience.summary: Architect and lead developer for a modern e‑commerce platform; UX, SEO, and content platform integration.
highlights: Architected an e‑commerce platform with React, Next.js, Apollo Client, and Contentful to streamline operations.
Implemented SEO improvements aligned with Next.js best practices and modern UX patterns.
Owned CI/CD and deployments via Netlify + GitHub; integrated store inventory with Odoo ERP.
Leveraged ChatGPT and GitHub Copilot to accelerate development and quality.

experience.summary: Built and maintained complex React + Node dashboards and healthcare video apps; testing and CI focus.
highlights: Led development & maintenance of a React/Node dashboard application.
Established E2E testing architecture with TestCafe and contributed to technical screenings.
Collaborated with design to deliver UI/UX enhancements; deployed via CircleCI and GitHub workflows.
Built a patient–healthcare personnel application (React, Redux, Vonage Video API) improving engagement.
Worked with Docker/Kubernetes/AWS for development and deployment enablement.
Active Scrum participation; ensured a11y‑minded UI delivery.

experience.summary: Built demos and integrations for Azure Cognitive Services using React/Angular with .NET/Node backends.
highlights: Developed demos for Azure Cognitive Services with React and Angular.
Championed TDD and contributed to API integration design for interoperability.

experience.summary: Marketing tech implementations: landing pages, CMS theming, and rich animations.
highlights: Built engaging landing pages and maintained WordPress/Drupal content.
Implemented GSAP animations and pixel‑perfect designs within brand guidelines.
Developed responsive, interactive email marketing templates.
Maintained the company portfolio site using AngularJS.

experience.summary: Travel and media systems; security and UX improvements.
highlights: Streamlined booking flows for Costa Rica Monkey Tours using the MEAN stack (AngularJS).
Implemented security measures and data protection.
Designed interactive UI components based on user feedback.
Contributed to a Radio/TV monitoring system for better data management.
